cookingTips: Toast baguette slices lightly in oven to make them sturdy enough for topping without soaking
Mix almond, bacon, and cheese spread ahead; it can be refrigerated and broiled just before serving
Broil appetizers for 1-2 minutes until cheese melts and almonds toast; watch closely to prevent burning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This savory appetizer combines crispy, nutty, and creamy textures. The Worcestershire sauce adds depth and umami to the cheese mixture.
